data.title: Excellent Criminal & DUI Defense in Duvall, WA

data.meta_site_name: The Law Offices of Kim E. Hunter, PLLC
data.text:
No one starts their day expecting that they will be pulled over for a DUI or end up being charged with a criminal misdemeanor, but when that happens to you, attorney Kim E. Hunter understands that it’s a “shock to the system” and one of the most stressful things that can happen to you. Entrust your legal defense to her capable, compassionate representation, and she will work with you to affordably navigate your case with you through the intricacies of the court system and the law to bring it to the best possible resolution.

Kim Hunter is recognized in Duvall and across Washington State as a top-notch attorney in these types of matters. Since 2015, she has been named as a Washington “Super Lawyer” by Super Lawyers Magazine, and was previously recognized as a Rising Star Lawyer for many years. She also has a “perfect 10” (Superb) on AVVO.com, the independent attorney rating service. With that kind of recognition, you know that she has the experience, knowledge, and skill to represent you extraordinarily well in court.

Don’t Hesitate to Contact Us

If you are charged with a DUI, whether it is alcohol or marijuana related, time is of the essence, and you need to be proactive about securing your legal representation. Washington DUI laws are among the strictest in the USA, and you don’t want to go it alone in the court system, or even worse yet, just ignore the situation.

Attorney Hunter always offers an initial free consultation for your case, and for DUI cases, she will also represent you free of charge at the initial Department of Licensing hearing if you engage her services for your case.
